articles.title: Why AstraZeneca May Dominate the Coronavirus Vaccine Market - The Motley Fool
articles.description: Lower efficacy than rivals may not hurt sales of AstraZeneca's potential vaccine.
articles.content: All eyes have been on the leaders in the coronavirus vaccine race these past few weeks. So far, Moderna(NASDAQ:MRNA), Pfizer(NYSE:PFE), and AstraZeneca(NASDAQ:AZN) have reported efficacy data from ph… [+4624 chars]

articles.title: Coeur d'Alene residents disappointed over cancelation of holiday light show - KXLY Spokane
articles.description: Every year, thousands of people comes to the holiday lighting celebration in downtown Coeur d'Alene to kickoff the holiday season. Sadly this will not be one of those years.
